sentences.en: " You say any more nonsense ,'said Hung - chien , gesturing at him , " and I'll give you a spanking. "
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 作势道: “ 你再胡说, 我打你. ”

sentences.en: Andrea gave her son a sound spanking.
sentences.cn: 安德烈娅给了儿子结结实实一顿痛打。

sentences.en: He heard a horse approaching at a spanking trot.
sentences.cn: 他听到一匹马正在疾步驰近.

sentences.en: Is spanking a good way to discipline children?
sentences.cn: 打屁股是教育儿童守纪律的好方法 吗 ?

sentences.en: Scarlett was inclined to be irritated with the child and favored a spanking.
sentences.cn: "思嘉给这孩子闹得不耐烦了,便主张打她一顿.

sentences.en: Scarlett was inclined to irritated with the child and favored a spanking.
sentences.cn: 思嘉给这孩子闹得不耐烦了,便主张打她一顿.

sentences.en: She will get a spanking for her bad grades.
sentences.cn: 她由于成绩太差而挨了顿打.

sentences.en: Sometimes only a good spanking will straighten out a naughty boy.
sentences.cn: 有时只有狠狠鞭挞才能使顽童学好.

sentences.en: The boat is spanking along on the river.
The film moves along at a spanking pace.
The upstairs bedrooms were spanking clean.
sentences.cn: 楼上的房间打扫得一尘不染。

sentences.en: The were spanking along nicely when suddenly a tyre burst.
sentences.cn: 他们的车正快速前进,突然一只轮胎爆了.

sentences.en: We had a spanking good time at his country house.
sentences.cn: 我们在他的乡间别墅玩得非常高兴.

sentences.en: We rode at a spanking trot.

words.tran_cn: 疾走者；出众者；船后桅纵帆；极好之物
拍击使之前进；打…的屁股

trans.tran_cn: 用手掌打( spank的现在分词 )
